title: Real-Time GPS Tracker with Raspberry Pi Pico & SIM800L GSM Module
shortDescription: build a real-time GPS tracker using the Raspberry Pi Pico, SIM800L GSM module, and Neo-6M GPS. The project enables accurate location tracking over cellular networks and covers complete hardware setup and data transmission, making it ideal for IoT, tracking, and embedded system applications.

detailSections.title: Introduction
detailSections.content: Building a real-time GPS tracker using the Raspberry Pi Pico, SIM800L GSM module, and Neo-6M GPS. The project enables accurate location tracking over cellular networks and covers complete hardware setup and data transmission, making it ideal for IoT, tracking, and embedded system applications.

detailSections.title: Features
detailSections.content:
• **Real-time GPS Tracking**: Continuous location updates via GSM module.
• **Cellular Data Transmission**: Sends GPS coordinates over cellular networks.
• **Power Efficient**: Optimized for long-term operation with minimal power consumption.
